languages.text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно от следующей атаки, наносящей {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

languages.text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно от следующей атаки, наносящей {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора</u> урона дополнительно от следующей пси-атаки.
Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора</u> урона дополнительно от следующей пси-атаки.

languages.text: 受导航者能力影响的敌人，再次受到导航者攻击承受{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}时，此次攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 受导航者能力影响的敌人，被导航者的灵能攻击再次命中时会受到额外伤害，等同于<u>导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットになった敵は、次の{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}になる攻撃から<u>航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットになった敵に対し、次のサイキック攻撃から<u>航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の追加ダメージを付与。

languages.text: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes de navegante sufren + <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional del siguiente ataque que inflija {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes de un navegante sufren +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante </u> de daño adicional desde el siguiente ataque psíquico realizado.

languages.text: Von Kräften des Navigators anvisierte Feinde erleiden +<u>Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den nächsten Angriff mit {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physischem Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Von Kräften des Navigators anvisierte Feinde erleiden +<u>Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> Zusatzschaden durch den nächsten physischen Angriff.

languages.text: Les ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du navigateur</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires lors de la prochaine attaque qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du Navigateur subissent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Navigateur</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires lors de l'attaque psychique suivante.

languages.text: Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}fiziksel hasar{/g} veren bir sonraki saldırıdan <u>Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ALG{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar.
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +<u>Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}.
